news.headline: Paramount Plans Proxy Fight to Push Hostile Warner Bid
news.summary: Paramount Skydance  plans to launch a proxy fight for board seats at  Warner Bros. Discovery  the company said Monday, as it continues pushing its hostile bid for the company.  Paramount also filed a lawsuit seeking to force Warner to release more information about its merger agreement with  Netflix  Paramount has long argued its offer, which Warner repeatedly rebuffed, is superior in value to Netflix’s.
